segments.text: Finding an excuse is obviously down your alley . And trying to avoid taking care of the children is what you are good at .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Listen , Nancy . If I don't work hard , I will be laid off .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are passing the buck . I'll be hanged if I ask you to go to the park with us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on , Nancy . Play it cool . I go with you and burn the middle night oil tonight .
segments.speaker: S2
